text: ve tumase poochhate hai ki "unake lie kya halaal hai?" kah do, "tumhaare lie saaree achchhee svachchh cheezen halaal hai aur jin shikaaree jaanavaron ko tumane sadhe hue shikaaree jaanavar ke roop mein sadha rakha ho - jinako jais allaah ne tumhen sikhaaya hain, sikhaate ho - ve jis shikaar ko tumhaare lie pakade rakhe, usako khao aur usapar allaah ka naam lo. aur allaah ka dar rakho. nishchay hee allaah jald hisaab lenevaala hai.
